cast.name: 阿列克谢·阿尔希波维奇·列昂诺夫 Alexei Leonov
谢尔盖·帕夫洛维奇·科罗廖夫 Sergei P. Korolev
尼基塔·赫鲁晓夫 Nikita Khrushchev

writer.name: 迈克尔·拉赫曼 Michael Lachmann

director.name: 迈克尔·拉赫曼 Michael Lachmann

this_title: Cosmonauts: How Russia Won the Space Race
trans_title: 苏联宇航员：俄罗斯是如何赢得太空竞赛的
introduction: When Neil Armstrong stepped onto the moon in 1969, America went down in popular history as the winner of the space race. But that history is bunk. The real pioneers of space exploration were the Soviet cosmonauts.This remarkable feature-length documentary combines rare and unseen archive footage with interviews with the surviving cosmonauts to tell the fascinating and at times terrifying story of how the Russians led us into the space age. A particular highlight is Alexei Leonov, the man who performed the first spacewalk, explaining how he found himself trapped outside his spacecraft 500 miles above the Earth. Scary stuff.
chinese_title: 苏联宇航员：俄罗斯是如何赢得太空竞赛的
foreign_title: Cosmonauts: How Russia Won the Space Race
